title: AI-ready integration foundation
summary: Design integration contracts, observability, and data access paths so AI capabilities can be safely added later.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: AI initiatives stall when integrations are opaque, inconsistent, or not observable.
whenToUse: You want AI to assist ops or accelerate development
whenNotToUse: You have no intent to use AI and prefer minimal telemetry

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Stabilize contracts and observability first; AI comes after foundations are in place.

complexity.rationale: Foundational discipline more than advanced ML.
complexity.toolingDemand: Telemetry + access controls + indexing for RAG.

starterDiagram.title: Foundation first
starterDiagram.description: Contracts and traces enable AI later.

realWorldExample.approach: Standardized events and traces then indexed audit logs for query.
realWorldExample.outcome: AI features delivered faster with fewer safety issues.
